docs.snippet: In the buildup to the World Cup, the Brazilian football catchphrase of "Jogo Bonito" — The Beautiful Game — was drowned out by the bangs of frantic construction work and the shouts of angry protesters. Not now.
docs.lead_paragraph: In the buildup to the World Cup, the Brazilian football catchphrase of "Jogo Bonito" — The Beautiful Game — was drowned out by the bangs of frantic construction work and the shouts of angry protesters. Not now.

headline.main: After Ugly Buildup, Time for Jogo Bonito in Brazil
headline.print_headline: After Ugly Buildup, Time for Jogo Bonito in Brazil

docs.snippet: One of the World Cup's most exciting games had the most empty seats in the first round of the tournament in Brazil.
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the World Cup's most exciting games had the most empty seats in the first round of the tournament in Brazil.

headline.main: Spain-Netherlands Match With Most Empty Seats
headline.print_headline: Spain-Netherlands Match With Most Empty Seats

docs.snippet: England's players felt a bit uneasy about being praised back home despite losing their World Cup opener. From now on, they know it's the results they'll be judged by, not the entertaining value of their games.
docs.lead_paragraph: England's players felt a bit uneasy about being praised back home despite losing their World Cup opener. From now on, they know it's the results they'll be judged by, not the entertaining value of their games.

headline.main: Result, Not Performance, the Focus for England
headline.print_headline: Result, Not Performance, the Focus for England

docs.snippet: Germany was supposed to be a team that would melt in Brazil's tropics, and the United States was supposed to be a team that can't beat Ghana.
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany was supposed to be a team that would melt in Brazil's tropics, and the United States was supposed to be a team that can't beat Ghana.

headline.main: Germany and US Win, Nigeria-Iran Play First Draw
headline.print_headline: Germany and US Win, Nigeria-Iran Play First Draw

docs.snippet: Soccer can be a source of many illusions, both good and bad — but mostly good.
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer can be a source of many illusions, both good and bad — but mostly good.

docs.snippet: A member of the prominent banking family, Mr. Safra recently invested in several real estate ventures in New York and London.

docs.abstract: Moise Y Safra, member of prominent Brazilian banking family who bought stake in General Motors Building on Fifth Avenue in Manhattan in 2013, dies at age 79.

headline.main: Moise Safra, Banker and Philanthropist, Dies at 79
